Summary: Builds High Performing Teams. With 30 years of relevant software development experience, including 15 years in leadership roles as a Lead Developer, Team Lead and Head of Engineering, I have been shaped by extensive experience and have autonomously grown into leadership from being a developer in diverse teams. Highly communicative and comfortable in leadership positions, I possess a unique combination of technical expertise and leadership acumen. My journey from developer to leader has honed both my soft and hard skills, essential for technology and leadership. Applications have been developed within commercial companies, government institutions, non-profit organizations, and the open-source community.
